channel.title: Personal on Sandarenu's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Personal on Sandarenu's Blog

item.title: Welcome to my new Blog
item.description: Welcome … I’m testing my new blog powered by hugo and github pages. I’ve bein using blogger for sometime. Blogger is really nice platform, but sometimes formatting a post takes lot of effort. Especially when I need to add some code samples it is not that easy. I love markdown, and I use it all the time in my day-today work. So wanted to try out static site generation using markdown.
